staxel.village.character.dialogue.Rosema: I hope you come to see me sometimes too and not just the rabbit...
I really wish I could give you a discount...
But the ^c:1486b0;pet store^c:pop; isn't really doing as well as I'd like.
You may be my...best friend, but I don't want to go bankrupt over that...
^c:1486b0;Cinnamon^c:pop; has really been getting along with ^c:1486b0;Poopsy^c:pop; and ^c:1486b0;Hazel^c:pop;.
All thanks to ^c:1486b0;Tomti^c:pop;, I am so happy!
Have you seen all the other new cute animals we have at the ^c:1486b0;pet store^c:pop; now.
It's hard to pick a favourite.
